name: Soccer Match HD
description:
Test your reaction and agility in this addictive soccer themed Match 3 game, as you race to complete the level before your time is up. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game. Beat your friend's scores on the leader board and share your successes with them on Facebook!

⚽ Brilliant visuals, which look absolutely stunning on the new HD iPads and iPhone 5.
⚽ Special power ups.
⚽ Two game modes; Arcade and Zen.
⚽ Soccer theme.
⚽ Easy to learn, yet hard to master.
⚽ Cascading combos helping you achieve massive scores.
⚽ Helpful hint feature or rotate the board if you get really stuck.
⚽ Climb the leader board and share your success with your friends on Facebook.

ARCADE MODE

Fast paced matching fun is on offer in the Arcade mode. Test your skill and reflexes as you race to complete the level before the timer overpowers you. Keep an eye out for the 'Extra Time' power up - you're going to need it!

ZEN MODE

Relax and chill in Zen mode, without a timer to harry and panic, you can lay back and focus on an addictive, never ending game of match 3. We even lower the music a couple of notches!

SPECIAL PIECES

☆ Cool As A Ninja
This laid-back chick wants to help YOU! Double tapping her will unleash her cold fury, causing her to destroy all pieces that match her colour.

☆ Rainbow Rooster
This colourful rooster is a special bird that can be matched with ANY other coloured piece.

☆ Cluck This!
This bad boy gives out an immense boiling heat which is capable of totally destroying all pieces in the same vertical or horizontal line.

☆ Angry Bird!
This bird is absolutely fuming and will destroy all pieces in the area surrounding it. Double tap to activate it and blow the balls to smithereens!

☆ Extra Time!
Double tap to pause the timer for a short while. Hurry though, it doesn't last forever!

☆ Left Back Rooster
To the left, to the left… This rooster can destroy all pieces to it's left!

☆ Right Back Rooster
Right? Right! This rooster can destroy all pieces to their right.

☆ Horizontal Disintegrator
This powerful piece packs a punch! It destroys all pieces within the same horizontal line as it, reducing them to piles of dust!

☆ Vertical Vaporiser
This Vaporiser contains bottled lightning, which ZAPS anything in the same vertical line as it.

GAME PLAY

Match 3 games are puzzle games. You need to match 3 or more objects by exchanging two pieces in a horizontal or vertical direction. Matched pieces are removed from the board and new pieces dropped back onto the board. The object is to clear the board and advance to the next level. Matching more than 4 pieces can trigger the spawning of power ups with special abilities, helping you clear larger areas of the board.

Massive scores can be quickly achieved by chaining together the matches, these are called cascading combos. Each new combo results in an increase in the score multiplier and continues until there are no more matches for that combo run.

If you're unsure of the next move then press the hint button for some help. The board will darken and two rotating arrows will show you the pieces to swap. Alternatively, you can rotate a quadrant of the board by pressing one of the rotate buttons that are situated in each corner of the board.
